name: Mole Path
description:
It's dangerous here, near the Earth's core. I'd never have believed i had to risk my life like that. But for now I have the ore and that's the only thing that matters. I have to keep it safe and saturate somehow, so that it doesn't lose energy before I get to the surface. I heard the screech. They may be ahead of me by now. Quick!

Directed by Oleg_Bone

Game designers: Oleg_Bone, Satacat, Kndratova, Rekkorize 

Artists:Satacat, Oleg_Bone

Coders: Rekkorize, Kndratova

The SoundDesigner: Rekkorize

Management:

Pull and release  objects several times to interact. 
Press Space to go under the ground.

This game prototype was created on local jam "288 game jam" in 72 hours.
